title: Ticket #3790: Various documentation reports
description:
Report from a user via rust: On page http://research.cs.wisc.edu/htcondor/manual/v8.0/4_1HTCondor_s_ClassAd.html In 4.1.2.2 Attributes

"An attributes may" should be "An attribute may"

in 4.1.2.4 Predefined Functions

"itemized in in Section" should be "itemized in Section"

String toUpper

"if greater than 1 argument" should be "if other than exactly 1 argument"

String formatTime

"coordinated universe time" should be "coordinated universal time"

in the regexp options section

M or m "carat" should be "caret" (2 instances)

in Boolean stringList_regexpMember(String pattern, String list [ , String delimiter ][, String options ])

it is not clear if options can be specified without specifying delimiter. How can the program decide whether I specified options or delimiter ?

Comparison operators: 5.

"The ! operator test for" should be "The ! operator tests for"
check_ins: 2013-Jul-31 12:49   Check-in [37050]: fix typos pointed out in #3790, and edit manual section 4.1.5 (same file), fixing prose that was never edited, and HT-ifying it. ===GT=== #738 (By Karen Miller )
creator: adesmet
